data.content: Added 22 direct method tests to stub-backend.test.ts covering all previously untested StubBackend methods (listReady, search, query, create, update, delete, close, listDependencies, addDependency, removeDependency, buildTakePrompt, buildPollPrompt) and STUB_CAPABILITIES verification. Coverage went from 27.77% to 100% across statements, branches, functions, and lines. Commit f2cf157 pushed to main.
